Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Monkey = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
Tool.Enabled = true
local petMonkey
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function summonMonkey() if myTorso and myHumanoid then petMonkey = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(71536048):GetChildren()[1] if petMonkey then debris:AddItem(petMonkey, 60) -- Make sure that it will get deleted petMonkey:MoveTo(myTorso.Position + Vector3.new(math.random(-3, 3), 0, math.random(-3, 3)))
local monkeyAIScript = Tool.MonkeyAIScript:Clone()
while monkeyAIScript:FindFirstChild("Monkey") == nil do wait() end
monkeyAIScript.Monkey.Value = petMonkey monkeyAIScript.Parent = vCharacter
local target = Instance.new("ObjectValue") target.Name = "Target" target.Value = nil target.Parent = petMonkey
wait() monkeyAIScript.Disabled = false
debris:AddItem(monkeyAIScript, 60)
petMonkey.Parent = game.Workspace petMonkey:MoveTo(myTorso.Position + Vector3.new(math.random(-3, 3), 0, math.random(-3, 3))) Monkey.Transparency = 1.0
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() wait(60.0) Monkey.Transparency = 0.0 end))
if petMonkey:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") then petMonkey.Humanoid.Died:connect(function() debris:AddItem(petMonkey, 4) wait(3.5) Monkey.Transparency = 0.0 end) end end end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
if not petMonkey or not petMonkey.Parent then summonMonkey() end
local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint local direction = (target - myTorso.Position).unit
local hit = game.Workspace:FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(myTorso.Position, direction * 150), vCharacter) if hit then local enemyHumanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if enemyHumanoid then if petMonkey:FindFirstChild("Target") then petMonkey.Target.Value = enemyHumanoid end end end
wait(2.0)
Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end
function onUnequipped() if petMonkey then petMonkey:Destroy() end Monkey.Transparency = 0.0 end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

while script:FindFirstChild("Monkey") == nil do wait() end
local petMonkey = script.Monkey
while petMonkey.Value == nil do wait() end
petMonkey = petMonkey.Value
while petMonkey:FindFirstChild("Target") == nil do wait() end
local target = petMonkey.Target
if target.Value == nil then --petMonkey:Remove() end
-- Best part about doing this from the character local vCharacter = script.Parent local myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") local myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
local petMonkeyHumanoid = petMonkey:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local petMonkeyTorso = petMonkey:FindFirstChild("Torso")
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local enemyHumanoid = target.Value
if petMonkeyHumanoid then petMonkeyHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 24.0
while petMonkeyHumanoid.MaxHealth < 350 do petMonkeyHumanoid.MaxHealth = 350 wait() end
while petMonkeyHumanoid.Health < 350 do petMonkeyHumanoid.Health = 350 wait() end end
local healCount = 0
function slash(hit) if hit and hit.Parent then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid ~= petMonkeyHumanoid and humanoid == enemyHumanoid and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(15) if myHumanoid then if myHumanoid.Health + 4 < myHumanoid.MaxHealth then myHumanoid.Health = myHumanoid.Health + 4 if myTorso and myTorso:FindFirstChild("MonkeyFire") == nil then local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Parent = myTorso fire.Name = "MonkeyFire" fire.Color = Color3.new(0, 0, 0) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(1, 0, 0) fire.Size = 4 debris:AddItem(fire, 1.5) end end end if humanoid.Health == 0 then followCharacter = true end end end end
local petMonkeyLeftArm = petMonkey:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") local petMonkeyRightArm = petMonkey:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") local petMonkeyLeftLeg = petMonkey:FindFirstChild("Left Leg") local petMonkeyRightLeg = petMonkey:FindFirstChild("Right Leg")
if petMonkeyLeftArm then petMonkeyLeftArm.Touched:connect(slash) end
if petMonkeyRightArm then petMonkeyRightArm.Touched:connect(slash) end
if petMonkeyRightLeg then petMonkeyRightLeg.Touched:connect(slash) end
if petMonkeyLeftLeg then petMonkeyLeftLeg.Touched:connect(slash) end
petMonkeyTorso.Touched:connect(slash)
local children = petMonkey:GetChildren() for i = 1, #children do if children[i].ClassName == "Tool" then if children[i]:FindFirstChild("Handle") then children[i].Handle.Touched:connect(slash) end end end
local targetEnemy if enemyHumanoid then targetEnemy = enemyHumanoid.Parent end local targetEnemyTorso
if targetEnemy then targetEnemyTorso = targetEnemy:FindFirstChild("Torso") if targetEnemyTorso == nil then --petMonkey:Remove() end else --petMonkey:Remove() end
target.Changed:connect(function() if target.Value then enemyHumanoid = target.Value targetEnemy = enemyHumanoid.Parent if targetEnemy then targetEnemyTorso = targetEnemy:FindFirstChild("Torso") end end end)
local animating = false
local checkAOE = Vector3.new(15, 15, 15)
while true do local ray = game.Workspace:FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(petMonkeyTorso.Position, petMonkeyTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 5.0), nil) if ray and petMonkeyHumanoid and ray.Parent ~= targetEnemy and ray.Parent ~= vCharacter then petMonkeyHumanoid.Jump = true end if targetEnemyTorso then local distance = (targetEnemyTorso.Position - petMonkeyTorso.Position).magnitude local targetEnemy = targetEnemyTorso.Parent if distance < 30 then local targetEnemyHumanoid = targetEnemy:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") petMonkeyHumanoid:MoveTo(targetEnemyTorso.Position, targetEnemyTorso) if distance < 4 and not animating then animating = true local biteAnim = petMonkeyHumanoid:LoadAnimation(script:FindFirstChild("BiteAnim")) if biteAnim then biteAnim:Play() end coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() wait(1.25) animating = false end)) end else if myTorso then petMonkeyHumanoid:MoveTo(myTorso.Position + Vector3.new(4, 0, 4), myTorso) end end else if myTorso then petMonkeyHumanoid:MoveTo(myTorso.Position + Vector3.new(4, 0, 4), myTorso) end end wait() end

local Tool = script.Parent local Lantern = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local vPlayer
local sg local frame
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer then local playerGui = vPlayer:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") if playerGui and playerGui:FindFirstChild("LanternGui") == nil then sg = Instance.new("ScreenGui") sg.Name = "LanternGui" sg.Parent = playerGui
frame = Instance.new("Frame") frame.Parent = sg frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 220, 0, 30) frame.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -110, 1, -130) frame.Style = Enum.FrameStyle.RobloxRound
local genericTextLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel") genericTextLabel.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 genericTextLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) genericTextLabel.Visible = true genericTextLabel.ZIndex = 10 genericTextLabel.FontSize = Enum.FontSize.Size10 genericTextLabel.Font = Enum.Font.Legacy genericTextLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 127/255, 0) genericTextLabel.TextXAlignment = Enum.TextXAlignment.Center genericTextLabel.TextYAlignment = Enum.TextYAlignment.Top genericTextLabel.Parent = frame genericTextLabel.Text = "Summon the Monkey!" end end end
function onUnequipped() if sg then sg:Remove() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
while true do if vCharacter and genericTextLabel then if vCharacter:FindFirstChild("MonkeyAIScript") then genericTextLabel.Text = "Command him onto your enemies!" else genericTextLabel.Text = "Summon the Monkey!" end end wait() end
